about_the_game:
NE❑N BEAT (Neon Beat) is an fast-paced rhythm game with simple one-handed controls! Play through over 100,000 hand-crafted levels, move your mouse to hit each beat in this minimalistic cyber world, it's satisfying when you hit all the 'Neon Floating Exploding Bread' (Quote from Jack, my little brother). Challenge yourself, your friends and beat high scores online!

Features

  • Experience the Rhythm: Dive into a seamless blend of music beats and stunning visuals!

  • Custom-Crafted Levels: In Neon Beat, you can experience your favorite songs from 'Beat Saver' or other online sites and enjoy your favorite levels in a new way!

  • Beat the Global Leaderboards: Challenge players worldwide across different difficulty levels and show your skill.

  • Simple to Start, Satisfying to Master: The easiest rhythm game ever—just move your cursor to catch the beats!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None

short_description: NE❑N BEAT is a rhythm game where you sync your mouse to hit every glowing beat flying towards you!
